kpi.name: sgsn_310a

kpi_info.title: Iu CDRs discarded due another reason
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows total amount of CDRs discarded due another reason from Iu interface.
kpi_info.formula:
sum(DIS_S_CDR_OF_IU_IF_DUE_OTHER + DIS_M_CDR_OF_IU_IF_DUE_OTHER +
DIS_SMO_CDR_OF_IU_DUE_OTHER + DIS_SMT_CDR_OF_IU_DUE_OTHER)

counters from table(s): p_sgsn_cdr

kpi.kpi_alias: Iu CDRs discarded due another reason
